I think I see what happened here - you didn't use the filter text at all but 
the listener on the return key for the filter text still executes.  So what we 
should do is if the default text is showing in the filter text we should not 
run the filtered text listener on the return key.

Created an attachment (id=29705)
apply patch to FilteredTree.java

Patch to fix the NPE.
Kim, can you check this patch?
